Name: "Ashcan" Pete
Ability: You begin the game with the Duke Unique Item.

Name: Agatha Crane
Ability: After you resolve a horror check, gain 1 Clue.

Name: Amanda Sharpe
Ability: You may perform two additional puzzle steps while attempting a puzzle.

Name: Bob Jenkins
Ability: Once per round, when you spend an action to interact with a Person, you may flip 1 Horror facedown or discard 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Carolyn Fern
Ability: Action: You or another investigator within range flip 1 Horror facedown or discard 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Carson Sinclair
Ability: Action: Another investigator within range may perform 1 action. Activate this ability only once per round.

Name: Darrell Simmons
Ability: Once per round, if you would gain a Clue, you may become Focused instead.

Name: Dexter Drake
Ability: Once per round, when you gain a Spell, become Focused.

Name: Father Mateo
Ability: Action: Another investigator within range becomes Focused. Activate this ability only once per round.

Name: Gloria Goldberg
Ability: At the start of your turn, if you have no Clues, gain 1 Clue.

Name: Harvey Walters
Ability: Action: Another investigator within range gains 1 Clue. Activate this ability only once per round.

Name: Jenny Barnes
Ability: Action: If you have no Clues, gain 2 Clues and discard 1 Horror.

Name: Joe Diamond
Ability: If you spend a Clue to convert an MG to a ES, you may convert up to two MG to ES instead.

Name: Kate Winthrop
Ability: You begin the game with the Flux Stabilizer Unique Item.

Name: Mandy Thompson
Ability: Once per round, when you gain a Clue, gain 1 additional Clue.

Name: Michael McGlen
Ability: Whenever a monster is defeated, become Focused.

Name: Minh Thi Phan
Ability: Once per round, you or another investigator within range may reroll 1 die while resolving a test.

Name: Monterey Jack
Ability: Other investigators in your space do not need to evade monsters.

Name: Preston Fairmont
Ability: Once per round, when you gain an Item, you may flip 1 Horror facedown or discard 1 facedown Horror.

Name: Rita Young
Ability: You may move 1 additional space as part of a move action.

Name: Sister Mary
Ability: Once per round, another investigator within range may convert an MG to a ES while resolving a test.

Name: Vincent Lee
Ability: Action: You or another investigator within range flip 1 Damage facedown or discard 1 facedown Damage.

Name: Wendy Adams
Ability: You cannot become Stunned or Restrained.

Name: William Yorick
Ability: Whenever a monster is defeated, gain 1 Clue.
